snippet.title: Green Hawk Platoon: Gameplay Trailer (Upcoming Game for 2024)
snippet.description:
Ever play with those little green plastic army guys as a kid? Well, so did we. We just wanted to bring these guys back into 2024 and give them a make-over.

This FPS/TPS shooter game is currently being developed but is expected to release later in 2024. It will include multiplayer deathmatch, capture the flag, conquest and some original new game modes, as well as a single player / co-op campaign mode later on in the year. Currently on PC, but will later join the Xbox and PlayStation console communities for an amazing cross play experience.

Wishlist it today! 
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2077890/Green_Hawk_Platoon/
Epic Games Store - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/green-hawk-platoon-218d49

#FPS #TPS #F2P #greenarmy #soldiers #plastic #toys #videogame #trailer
